select REVIEW_NO_SEQ.NEXTVAL from dual
insert into review (review_no, order_no, product_no, board_no, star_rate, content, write_date, help_point) values(#{review_no}, #{order_no}, #{product_no}, #{board_no}, #{star_rate}, #{content}, #{write_date}, #{help_point})

select INQUIRY_NO_SEQ.NEXTVAL from dual
insert into PRODUCT_INQUIRY (INQUIRY_NO, BOARD_NO, INQUIRY_CONTENT, INQUIRY_DATE, EMPTANSWER, ANSWER_CONTENT, ANSWER_DATE, SHOPPER_NO) values (#{INQUIRY_NO}, #{BOARD_NO}, #{INQUIRY_CONTENT}, sysdate, 1, null, null, #{SHOPPER_NO})
mapper.select: SELECT r.REVIEW_NO, r.STAR_RATE, r.CONTENT, r.WRITE_DATE, r.HELP_POINT, s.SHOPPER_NAME FROM REVIEW r, ORDER_HISTORY o, SHOPPER s WHERE r.ORDER_NO = o.ORDER_NO AND o.SHOPPER_NO = s.SHOPPER_NO AND r.BOARD_NO = #{BOARD_NO}

SELECT r.REVIEW_NO, r.STAR_RATE, r.CONTENT, r.WRITE_DATE, r.HELP_POINT, s.SHOPPER_NAME FROM REVIEW r, ORDER_HISTORY o, SHOPPER s WHERE r.ORDER_NO = o.ORDER_NO AND o.SHOPPER_NO = s.SHOPPER_NO AND r.BOARD_NO = #{BOARD_NO} ORDER BY r.WRITE_DATE DESC

SELECT r.REVIEW_NO, r.STAR_RATE, r.CONTENT, r.WRITE_DATE, r.HELP_POINT, s.SHOPPER_NAME FROM REVIEW r, ORDER_HISTORY o, SHOPPER s WHERE r.ORDER_NO = o.ORDER_NO AND o.SHOPPER_NO = s.SHOPPER_NO AND r.BOARD_NO = #{BOARD_NO} ORDER BY r.HELP_POINT DESC

select INQUIRY_NO, INQUIRY_CONTENT, INQUIRY_DATE, EMPTANSWER, ANSWER_CONTENT, ANSWER_DATE, SHOPPER_NAME from PRODUCT_INQUIRY i, SHOPPER s where i.SHOPPER_NO = s.SHOPPER_NO and BOARD_NO = #{BOARD_NO} order by INQUIRY_DATE desc
SELECT MEDIA_NO FROM BOARD_MEDIA m, PRODUCT_BOARD b WHERE m.BOARD_NO = b.BOARD_NO and b.BOARD_NO = #{bno} and MEDIA_NAME like '%detailView_content%' order by MEDIA_NAME
select MEDIA_DATA as mediaData from PRODUCT_BOARD b, BOARD_MEDIA m where b.BOARD_NO = m.BOARD_NO and b.BOARD_NO = #{bno} and MEDIA_NAME like '%detailView_main1%'

SELECT b.BOARD_NO as boardNo, p.PRODUCT_NO as productNo, p.PRODUCT_NAME as productName, p.PRODUCT_PRICE as productPrice, p.PRODUCT_OPTION as productOption, p.DISCOUNT_RATE as discountRate, p.DISCOUNT_PRICE as discountPrice FROM PRODUCT p, PRODUCT_BOARD b WHERE p.PRODUCT_NO = b.PRODUCT_NO AND b.BOARD_NO = #{bno}

SELECT BOARD_NO as boardNo, ITEM as item, WEIGHT as weight, PRODUCER as producer, ORIGIN as origin, PRODUCTION_DATE as productionDate, DETAIL as detail, IMPORTED_FOOD_STATEMENT as importedFoodStatement, COMPOSITION as composition, STORAGE_TYPE as storageType, PRECAUTION as precaution, CS_CONTACT as csContact FROM FOOD_REQUIRED_INFO WHERE BOARD_NO = #{boardNo}
SELECT MEDIA_NO as mediaNo, BOARD_NO as boardNo, MEDIA_NAME as mediaName, MEDIA_DATA as mediaData FROM BOARD_MEDIA WHERE BOARD_NO = #{boardNo} AND MEDIA_NAME LIKE '%content%' order by MEDIA_NAME

select MEDIA_NAME as mediaName, MEDIA_DATA as mediaData from PRODUCT_BOARD b, BOARD_MEDIA m where b.BOARD_NO = m.BOARD_NO and b.BOARD_NO = #{bno} and MEDIA_NAME like '%detailView_main%' order by MEDIA_NAME
select PRODUCT_NO as productNo, PRODUCT_NAME as productName, PRODUCT_OPTION as productOption, DISCOUNT_PRICE as discountPrice from PRODUCT where PRODUCT_NAME = #{name}

select REVIEW_NO as reviewNo, ORDER_NO as orderNo, PRODUCT_NO as productNo, BOARD_NO as boardNo, STAR_RATE as starRate, HELP_POINT as helpPoint, CONTENT as content, SHOPPER_NAME as shopperName, PRODUCT_NAME as productName, WRITE_DATE as writeDate from ( select rownum as rnum, REVIEW_NO, ORDER_NO, PRODUCT_NO, BOARD_NO, STAR_RATE, HELP_POINT, CONTENT, SHOPPER_NAME, PRODUCT_NAME, WRITE_DATE from ( SELECT r.REVIEW_NO, r.ORDER_NO, r.PRODUCT_NO, r.BOARD_NO, r.STAR_RATE, r.HELP_POINT, r.CONTENT, s.SHOPPER_NAME, p.PRODUCT_NAME, r.WRITE_DATE FROM REVIEW r, ORDER_HISTORY o, SHOPPER s, RECEIPT_HISTORY rh, PRODUCT p WHERE r.ORDER_NO = o.ORDER_NO AND o.SHOPPER_NO = s.SHOPPER_NO AND r.ORDER_NO = rh.ORDER_NO AND rh.PRODUCT_NO = p.PRODUCT_NO AND BOARD_NO = #{BOARD_NO} ) where rownum <= #{endRowNo} ) where rnum >= #{startRowNo}

select REVIEW_NO as reviewNo, ORDER_NO as orderNo, PRODUCT_NO as productNo, BOARD_NO as boardNo, STAR_RATE as starRate, HELP_POINT as helpPoint, CONTENT as content, SHOPPER_NAME as shopperName, PRODUCT_NAME as productName, WRITE_DATE as writeDate from ( select rownum as rnum, REVIEW_NO, ORDER_NO, PRODUCT_NO, BOARD_NO, STAR_RATE, HELP_POINT, CONTENT, SHOPPER_NAME, PRODUCT_NAME, WRITE_DATE from ( SELECT r.REVIEW_NO, r.ORDER_NO, r.PRODUCT_NO, r.BOARD_NO, r.STAR_RATE, r.HELP_POINT, r.CONTENT, s.SHOPPER_NAME, p.PRODUCT_NAME, r.WRITE_DATE FROM REVIEW r, ORDER_HISTORY o, SHOPPER s, RECEIPT_HISTORY rh, PRODUCT p WHERE r.ORDER_NO = o.ORDER_NO AND o.SHOPPER_NO = s.SHOPPER_NO AND r.ORDER_NO = rh.ORDER_NO AND rh.PRODUCT_NO = p.PRODUCT_NO AND BOARD_NO = #{BOARD_NO} ORDER BY r.HELP_POINT DESC ) where rownum <= #{endRowNo} ) where rnum >= #{startRowNo}

select REVIEW_NO as reviewNo, ORDER_NO as orderNo, PRODUCT_NO as productNo, BOARD_NO as boardNo, STAR_RATE as starRate, HELP_POINT as helpPoint, CONTENT as content, SHOPPER_NAME as shopperName, PRODUCT_NAME as productName, WRITE_DATE as writeDate from ( select rownum as rnum, REVIEW_NO, ORDER_NO, PRODUCT_NO, BOARD_NO, STAR_RATE, HELP_POINT, CONTENT, SHOPPER_NAME, PRODUCT_NAME, WRITE_DATE from ( SELECT r.REVIEW_NO, r.ORDER_NO, r.PRODUCT_NO, r.BOARD_NO, r.STAR_RATE, r.HELP_POINT, r.CONTENT, s.SHOPPER_NAME, p.PRODUCT_NAME, r.WRITE_DATE FROM REVIEW r, ORDER_HISTORY o, SHOPPER s, RECEIPT_HISTORY rh, PRODUCT p WHERE r.ORDER_NO = o.ORDER_NO AND o.SHOPPER_NO = s.SHOPPER_NO AND r.ORDER_NO = rh.ORDER_NO AND rh.PRODUCT_NO = p.PRODUCT_NO AND BOARD_NO = #{BOARD_NO} ORDER BY r.WRITE_DATE DESC ) where rownum <= #{endRowNo} ) where rnum >= #{startRowNo}

select REVIEW_NO as reviewNo, ORDER_NO as orderNo, PRODUCT_NO as productNo, BOARD_NO as boardNo, STAR_RATE as starRate, HELP_POINT as helpPoint, CONTENT as content, SHOPPER_NAME as shopperName, PRODUCT_NAME as productName, WRITE_DATE as writeDate from ( select rownum as rnum, REVIEW_NO, ORDER_NO, PRODUCT_NO, BOARD_NO, STAR_RATE, HELP_POINT, CONTENT, SHOPPER_NAME, PRODUCT_NAME, WRITE_DATE from ( SELECT r.REVIEW_NO, r.ORDER_NO, r.PRODUCT_NO, r.BOARD_NO, r.STAR_RATE, r.HELP_POINT, r.CONTENT, s.SHOPPER_NAME, p.PRODUCT_NAME, r.WRITE_DATE FROM REVIEW r, ORDER_HISTORY o, SHOPPER s, RECEIPT_HISTORY rh, PRODUCT p WHERE r.ORDER_NO = o.ORDER_NO AND o.SHOPPER_NO = s.SHOPPER_NO AND r.ORDER_NO = rh.ORDER_NO AND rh.PRODUCT_NO = p.PRODUCT_NO AND BOARD_NO = #{Pager.BOARD_NO} AND r.CONTENT LIKE '%' || #{Keyword} || '%' ) where rownum <= #{Pager.endRowNo} ) where rnum >= #{Pager.startRowNo}
